abstract: The second finding of the rare south-east European endemic land snail Soosia diodonta (FÃ©russac, 1821) in Bulgaria was reported. The locality was situated in Eastern Stara Planina Mts., west from Kotel town, near the road to Zeleniche Forestry and the Kotlenska River, before Prikazna Cave, UTM: MH 55. Soosia diodonta was found in beech (Fagus sylvatica) forest on a limestone terrain near a river. It was the most eastern ever known locality of this species.
